ear) belongs to the NIP $( \$ 62.3$ billion) and the rest to the MIP ( $\$ 23.3$ billion). The 9/11 Commission recommended the IC to declassify its budget, and the community has done so since 2011 for the NIP and 2012 for the MIP. (ODNI 2022b.)
